item.title: EPISODE4 - Phillies are Rollin/Hi I'm Reggie/New Flyers=New Sweaters!
item.author: yourjokes@hotmail.com
item.description: The Phillies continue to beat up on the Mets. The Sixers finally have a forward (Reggie Evans) WOW! The Flyers have a new team and new sweaters...looking good! 3 words: EAGLES MONDAY NIGHT..nuff said. This week on PFS!

item.title: EPISODE3-EAGLES PREVIEW/BRETT MYERS IS A RETARD!
item.author: yourjokes@hotmail.com
item.description: This week we review the Eagles up coming season and look back at the Phillies choking away the playoffs again. Brett Myers really is a retard how do you spell that buddy! Plus Flyers and Sixers news.
